params._about: Address that the attestation is about.
params._key: A key used to namespace the attestation.
params._val: An arbitrary value stored as part of the attestation.

returns._0: Semver contract version as a string.

attest(address,bytes32,bytes).notice: Allows anyone to create an attestation.

attestations(address,address,bytes32).notice: Maps addresses to attestations. Creator => About => Key => Value.

version().notice: Returns the full semver contract version.

documentation.text: @notice Maps addresses to attestations. Creator => About => Key => Value.

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => mapping(address => mapping(bytes32 => bytes storage ref)))

documentation.text:
@notice Allows anyone to create attestations.
 @param _attestations An array of attestation data.
